Summary: While gardening outside, I saw a ufo.
Object Shape: Diamond, Egg, Flash, Oval, Sphere, Star-like
trends: There have been 404 other sightings in Los Angeles
There were no other sightings in Los Angeles on or around April 16th 2013
divs: Sighting DetailsWhile outside tending my garden, i had the thought ,look up! Right where i looked up and to the north east i saw a morphing orb switching between blue white white pink white grey white colors. I felt time almost stop as i connected with the ufo. Then affer the connection ceased i wanted a closer look. I decided to run in and get my binoculars. I took two steps and was almost told to stop and look up and when i did the ufo was vanished. I grew up around an air force base and studied airplanes and got to see more then the normal kid gets to. I know of nothing like this.
